name: acme
description: Web app backend implementation, with authentication, users and products handling
author: marcolino

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --exit --timeout 10000 --slow 150 --bail --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test/test-results.xml test/ | tee /tmp/test.log && node scripts/parseTestResults.mjs && rm -f ./test/test-results.xml
scripts.i18n-pre: bash -c 'for dir in $(cat ../acme-client/src/config.json | jq -r ".locales | keys[]"); do mkdir -p "src/locales/$dir/"; done'
scripts.i18n-check: sh -c 'yarn i18n && missing=$(grep --only-matching __STRING_NOT_TRANSLATED__ src/locales/*/translation.json | wc -l); if [ $missing -gt 0 ]; then echo "$missing strings have to be translated!"; exit 1; fi'
scripts.checks: yarn test && yarn i18n-check && yarn deps-check && yarn jshint-check && yarn eslint-check && echo "All checks passed"
scripts.fly-create-app-production: flyctl apps list | grep -q 'acme-prod' || flyctl apps create 'acme-prod'
scripts.fly-create-app-staging: flyctl apps list | grep -q 'acme-staging' || flyctl apps create 'acme-staging'
scripts.fly-create-volume-products-production: flyctl volumes list -a 'acme-prod' | grep -q 'products' || flyctl volumes create products -a 'acme-prod' --size 1
scripts.fly-create-volume-products-staging: flyctl volumes list -a 'acme-staging' | grep -q 'products-staging' || flyctl volumes create products-staging -a 'acme-staging' --size 1
scripts.fly-prepare-production: yarn fly-create-app-production && yarn fly-create-volume-products-production && yarn fly-import-secrets-production
scripts.fly-prepare-staging: yarn fly-create-app-staging && yarn fly-create-volume-products-staging && yarn fly-import-secrets-staging
scripts.fly-pre-deploy-production: yarn checks && yarn fly-upgrade && yarn fly-prepare-production
scripts.fly-pre-deploy-staging: yarn checks && yarn fly-upgrade && yarn fly-prepare-staging
scripts.pub-staging: NODE_ENV=staging yarn client-build && yarn fly-pre-deploy-staging && yarn fly-deploy-staging
scripts.pub: NODE_ENV=production yarn client-build && yarn fly-pre-deploy-production && yarn fly-deploy-production
